hero.welcomeMessage: SELC hagsaeng helpeu deseukeue osin geos-eul hwan-yeonghabnida.
hero.desc: ulineun hagsaeng poteol-eul sayonghaneun bangbeob-e daehan dangyebyeol gaideuleul jegonghagi wihae wassseubnida.
hero.banner: deo balg-eun milaeleul hyanghae hagsaengdeul-ui yeoglyang-eul ganghwahabnida. deo balg-eun milaeleul hyanghae hagsaengdeul-ui yeoglyang-eul ganghwahabnida. deo balg-eun milaeleul hyanghan hagsaengdeul-ui yeoglyang ganghwa

faq.subheading: ulie daehae al-aya hal modeun geos-eul mul-eoboseyo
faq.q1: Q. SELC Collegeneun jijeong hagseub jiggwan(DLI)ibnikka? daehag-ui DLI beonhoneun mueos-ibnikka?
faq.ans1: ye, SELC Collegeneun jijeong hagseub gigwan-imyeo daehag-ui DLI beonhoneun da-eumgwa gatseubnida.
faq.q2: Q. SELC Collegee daehan olienteisyeon-i issnayo?
faq.ans2: ye, olienteisyeon-eun hagsaengdeul-ege daehag-eul al-abogo, kaempeoseue daehae al-abogo, haengjeong damdangjawa sangho jag-yonghago, pil-yohal ttae doum-eul bad-eul su issneun jawon-eul hwag-inhal su issneun gihoeleul jegonghabnida. olienteisyeon-ui juyo mogjeog-eun hagsaengdeul-eul wihan tantanhan hagseub hwangyeong-gwa jiwon siseutem-eul gangjohaneun geos-ibnida. sin-ibsaeng olienteisyeon-e chamseoghaneun geos-eun modeun sin-ibsaeng-ege uimu sahang-ibnida. seong-gongjeog-in isuneun daleun koseu deunglog-eul wihan jeonje jogeon-igi ttaemun-ibnida.
faq.q3: Q. SELC daehag-eun hagsaengdeul-ege sugso jiwon-eul jegonghabnikka?
faq.q4: Q. SELCneun hagsaengdeul-ege janghaggeum, bosang ttoneun bojogeum-eul jegonghabnikka?
faq.ans4: ye, ulineun gugnae hagsaeng-gwa gugje hagsaeng moduga iyonghal su issneun dayanghan janghaggeum, sang, bojogeum-eul jegonghabnida. jagyeog yogeon mich jichimgwa hamkke jeonche moglog-e aegseseuhalyeomyeon dangsa lisoseuleul chamjohasibsio.
faq.q5: Q. hagsaengdeul-eun eotteon gyotongsudan-eul iyonghal su issnayo?
faq.ans5: SELC Collegeneun baenkubeo dauntaun jiyeog-ui jungsimbue wichihayeo beoseuwa seukaiteulein(SkyTrain) yeog-eul pohamhan dosiui gwangbeom-wihan daejung gyotong neteuwokeue pyeonlihage jeobgeunhal su issseubnida. ileohan jung-ang wichi deogbun-e hagsaengdeul-eun daehag-eul oganeun swibgo hyoyuljeog-in tonghag obsyeon-eul hwagbohal su iss-eumyeo, dosiui dayanghan jiyeog-eseo yeohaenghaneun salamdeul-i swibge jeobgeunhal su issseubnida.
faq.ans6: kaenada-eseo gongbuhaneun yuhagsaengdeul-eun choeso 6gaewol dong-an pultaim peulogeulaem-e deungloghan gyeong-u judang choedae 20sigankkaji ilhal su issseubnida. jasehan naeyong-eun da-eum-eul chamjohaseyo.
faq.q7: Q. daehag-eseoneun hagsaengdeul-ege jinlo jo-eon-ina jiwon-eul jegonghabnikka?
faq.ans7: ne, jeohui hyeobdongjohab buseoneun hagsaengdeul-i chwieob sijang-e junbihal su issdolog jiwon-eul jegonghabnida.

contact.name: seongmyeong
contact.para: yocheong-eul cheolihaneun de choedae 24sigan-i geollil su issseubnida. yanghaehae jusyeoseo gamsahabnida!
